tha-ap294:0.3_0: Hearing this flower, with senior monks,
tha-ap294:2.1_0: Seeing the light of the world,
tha-ap294:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap294:3.4_0: that is the fruit of the ascetic.
tha-ap294:4.3_0: There is a hall named Vāsava,
tha-ap294:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap294:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhī.
